features: HOLDS 18-PAIR OF SHOES – This standing shoe rack neatly stores and organizes 18 pairs of tennis shoes, boots, heels, or cleats. The vertical design of the shoe shelf offers versatile placement in your bedroom, mudroom, closet, or entryway.

3 ADJUSTABLE TIERS - The shoe tree rack for entryway has 3 movable tiers can be positioned and repositioned anywhere along the pole to adjust the spacing between each level to make sure every shoe fits comfortably.

REVOLVING SHOE RACK – The spinning shoe rack features a durable metal frame with a chrome finish. Each of the 3 tiers rotates in 360-degrees for easy access and storage of the different pairs of shoes or other objects stored on the shelves.

STABLE AND VERSATILE – This shoe tower rack features a weighted base for balance to prevent it from falling over, a handle for lifting so you can reposition the shoe carousel in any room in your home, and an attractive chrome finish.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: Steel. Dimensions: (L) 10.75” x (W) 10.75” x (H) 30.5”. The shoe organizer for closet is easy to assemble without tools. Color: Chrome.
body.description: Neatly store 18 pairs of tennis shoes, boots, heels, or cleats with this Rotating Shoe Rack by Lavish Home. The shoe rack for entryway has 3 movable revolving tiers that can be positioned and repositioned anywhere along the pole to adjust the spacing between each level to make sure every shoe fits comfortably. A weighted base keeps the shoe organizer balanced to prevent it from falling over. The shoe shelf is easy to assemble without tools, has an attractive chrome finish, and features a handle for lifting so you can reposition the tree in any room in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's good price and I like it it just needs to be a bit more sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I like it the price is good but it just needs to be a bit more sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little flimsier than expected..
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my mmothers shoes and it was easy to put together. Unfortunately, the weight of so many pairs of shoes is a bit too heavy for this product and you need to be careful not to fill it up totally. Especially spoprts shoes weight it down too much and it falls over when you try to turn the swivel shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the Job done.
reviews.reviewText: Nothing super fancy, but gets the Job done. Goes together fairly quickly. I've had for over a year and is holding up well... Great space saver! We use this heavily and fequently and only have to tighten once or twice a year to keep from wobbling. Well worth the effort for the price and convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars defeinitly not the best but it holds my daughters shoes
reviews.reviewText: i though it was like the one i originally purchased but its ok not the best. it holds my kids shoes. i make use of it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very Poor Quality Show Rack
reviews.reviewText: Really bad product. Since I purchased it, it would lean over to the side and not stand up straight and randomly top over. I’d then twist back onto base and just let it lean against the wall. After about 2-3 weeks it just broke off from the base, where it can noLonger screw on. Don't waste your money on this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It meets every need for shoes
reviews.reviewText: Very nice, just what I needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it falls over, you can't put anything heavy on it. i'm keeping it for my flip flops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It served its purpose
reviews.reviewText: I used this as bow/ head wrap storage. I put baby shoes on the bottom tier. It did its job. If I were to put adult or big kid shoes it wouldn’t serve its purpose. It’s not super sturdy.

This is perfect for your young ones. Holds plenty of shoes and the “bowl” style design is good for holding socks as well. Only suggestion is the base could be a little wider as its a bit tippy. Otherwise great buy!
It was great to put all my shoes on the rack instead of in a pile on the floor. Well worth the price.
the screw easy to get loose

This shoe tree, even when assembled correctly is very wobbly and tips over way too easily.I have had 2 other very similar shoe trees that were much more stable. This one tips right over if you happen to take two pairs of shoes off the same side.I would give it 0 stars for sturdiness if that were possible.
